name: libntfs-wii
short_description:
libntfs is a port of the [http://www.tuxera.com/community/ntfs-3g-download/ NTFS-3G] driver to the Nintendo GameCube/Wii, modeled on the libfat interface. Features: - Full read/write, files of any size can be created, modified, renamed, moved, or deleted. - Compression, read/write support for compressed files - Symbolic link and directory junction walking - Partial journaling (see below)
Credits A big thanks to all the authors of NTFS-3G, of which this library makes use of. Thanks also to the following: * Authors of libogc for providing the libraries framework * Authors of libfat for laying the foundations * rodries for his help and contributions (cache, bug fixes, etc)
summary: libntfs is a port of the NTFS-3G driver to the Nintendo GameCube/Wii
